Text.val: -- only Querymode, when the parent program OPH101C called from OPH106C
11.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
13.01.2011 SH SCR16131 Changed update of BDPD to achieve that SFIP_REFERENCE is
always stored as first BDPD row
06.12.2010 SH SCR16043 Added test SFIP_REFERENCE <> blank
... first try to updated BDPD with SFIP_REFERENCE
... if updated is not successful store a new BDPD row
-- SFIP_REFERENCE has to be always stored in first BDPD, to enable proper auto.
payent handling. So the BDPD rows have to be re-created.
-- If no BDPD exists yet, SFIP_REFERENCE has to be simply stored to BDPD
-- Store SFIP_REFERENCE as first BDPD row
-- Store already existing rows to BDPD after SFIP_REFERENCE, see T.P.
